title: Python Programming Basics
description: Learn the fundamentals of Python programming with hands-on exercises and coding challenges.

topics.title: Introduction to Python
topics.content: Welcome to Python programming! In this lesson, you'll learn the basics of Python syntax and structure.

cards.content: Python is a high-level, interpreted programming language known for its simplicity and readability.
cards.explanation: Python's design philosophy emphasizes code readability and simplicity.

cards.content: Write a Python program that prints 'Hello, World!' to the console.
cards.explanation: This is your first Python program!

topics.title: Understanding Variables
topics.content: Learn how to create and use variables in Python.

cards.content: What is the correct way to assign a value to a variable in Python?
cards.explanation: In Python, you use the assignment operator (=) to assign values to variables.

cards.content: Create a variable called 'name' and assign your name to it, then print it.
cards.explanation: Variables store data that can be used later in your program.
